mapper.select: SELECT A.CLC_WRK_NO, A.SO_ID, A.P_SEQ, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.USE_YYMM, A.CTRT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.ACT_DT, A.INACT_DT, A.RATE_STRT_DT, A.TERM_DT, A.CTRT_STAT, A.PROD_CD, A.PROD_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_STS_CD, A.SVC_TEL_NO, A.FCTR_CD, A.FCTR_VAL, B.CHRG_CTGRY, B.RATE_ITM_CD, B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD, B.RACT_DT, B.RINACT_DT, 0 AS USE_AMT, 0 AS USE_QTY, 0 AS USE_CNT, NOW() AS REG_DATE, 0 AS VAT, '0000000000' AS GRP_ID, '1' AS USE_QTY_UT, A.MONTHLY_NEGO_RATE, A.PROD_CNT, A.PROC_RATE, A.FCTR_CD1, A.FCTR_VAL1, A.FCTR_CD2, A.FCTR_VAL2, A.FCTR_CD3, A.FCTR_VAL3, A.FCTR_CD4, A.FCTR_VAL4, A.FCTR_CD5, A.FCTR_VAL5, A.FCTR_CD6, A.FCTR_VAL6, A.FCTR_CD7, A.FCTR_VAL7, A.FCTR_CD8, A.FCTR_VAL8, A.FCTR_CD9, A.FCTR_VAL9, A.FCTR_CD10, A.FCTR_VAL10, A.FCTR_CD11, A.FCTR_VAL11, A.FCTR_CD12, A.FCTR_VAL12, A.FCTR_CD13, A.FCTR_VAL13, A.FCTR_CD14, A.FCTR_VAL14, A.FCTR_CD15, A.FCTR_VAL15, A.FCTR_CD16, A.FCTR_VAL16, A.FCTR_CD17, A.FCTR_VAL17, A.FCTR_CD18, A.FCTR_VAL18, A.FCTR_CD19, A.FCTR_VAL19 FROM TBLCH_SVC_CMPS_MT A, (SELECT DISTINCT B.PROD_CD, B.CHRG_CTGRY, B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD, A.RATE_ITM_CD , A.ACT_DT AS RACT_DT, A.INACT_DT AS RINACT_DT FROM IFNBRM_RATE_INFO A, IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO B WHERE A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD AND B.CHRG_CTGRY ='R' AND B.RATE_LOCAT = 'B' AND A.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND A.INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND B.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND B.INACT_DT >= #{startDate}) B WHERE A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.CLC_WRK_NO = #{clcWrkNo} AND A.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.ACT_DT <= B.RINACT_DT AND A.INACT_DT >= B.RACT_DT AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ORDER BY A.SO_ID, A.CTRT_ID, B.PROD_CD,B.RATE_ITM_CD,A.PROD_CMPS_ID, A.ACT_DT DESC
